dbwebdescriptor.label: CPN - SPE
dbwebdescriptor.description: CPN - List of Special features for DBWeb

queries.querystring: Select dbn_mr_spe_nu ,dbn_mr_spe_code ,dbn_mr_spe_title ,dbn_mr_spe_status ,concat('MRN_SPE06#10#',dbn_mr_spe_description) dbn_mr_spe_description ,concat('MRN_SPE06#35#',dbn_mr_spe_remark) dbn_mr_spe_remark ,concat('MRN_SPE06#20#',dbn_mr_spe_expval) dbn_mr_spe_expval ,dbn_mr_spe_expspe from dbn_mr_l_special_features_example where dbn_mr_spe_status not like '%D%'

Select dbn_mr_spe_nu ,dbn_mr_spe_code ,dbn_mr_spe_title ,dbn_mr_spe_status ,concat('MRN_SPE06#10#',dbn_mr_spe_description) dbn_mr_spe_description ,concat('MRN_SPE06#35#',dbn_mr_spe_remark) dbn_mr_spe_remark ,concat('MRN_SPE06#20#',dbn_mr_spe_expval) dbn_mr_spe_expval ,dbn_mr_spe_expspe from dbn_mr_l_special_features_example where dbn_mr_spe_status like '%D%'
